Rebirth Items.itemDescription: • Gives Isaac an orbital ball of bandages that deals 7 contact damage per tick. In Afterbirth this orbital can now block shots, making it equal to the Cube of Meat.

UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #18 (The Host).

However, If you also have flying you will always take damage.

If you can get Undefined to teleport you to an I AM ERROR room, there will be a beam of light that takes you back to a new Chest/Dark Room floor with the same layout and refreshed rooms.  In Afterbirth this item no longer allows you to loop through the final floor, as the I AM ERROR rooms have been removed from those floors.  UNLOCK: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with Eden.

'Bad Trip' turns into 'Balls of Steel' and 'Amnesia' turns into 'I can see forever'.  • One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.

If your speed stat is already higher then that value is still used.  • Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing, becoming invulnerable during the charge and damaging enemies while also casting the effect of Crack The Sky.  • The charge of the spacebar attack deals 40 damage on contact with enemies and the beams deal damage equal to your tear damage + 20.  • Drops from the Conquest boss fight.

• When you only have half a heart remaining or less, you enter a curse state which adds +1.5 damage and +0.3 speed.  • When playing as Eve, this item activates with one FULL heart remaining or less AND also removes her 0.75 damage multiplier, raising it up to 1.0.  • The effect is permanently active for characters with no red hearts (e.g. Blue Baby, The Lost).  • One of Eve's starting items.
